meanings.definition: A place where pigs are kept or raised.
meanings.sent1: The farmer built new piggeries for his pigs.
meanings.sent2: We visited the piggeries to see the cute piglets.
meanings.sent3: The piggeries were so full of pigs, it looked like a pig party!
meanings.sent4: The piggeries were a bustling pig metropolis.
meanings.sent5: The smell of the piggeries lingered in the air.

meanings.sent1: Her family has been involved in piggeries for generations.
meanings.sent2: Learning about piggeries is important for pig farmers.
meanings.sent3: The art of piggeries requires dedication and care.
meanings.sent4: In the world of piggeries, every pig has a story.
meanings.sent5: The history of piggeries dates back centuries.
